Display Name = ""
Parallax Name = "Campsite Alt Alt"
Note = "<tile lock parallax>"

CommonEvent 1
Name = "Campfire"

  Page 0
    Comment(["<always update>"])
    Comment(["[light 40]"])
    ControlSwitches([3016, 3016, 0])
    ShowAnimation([0, 239, true])
    ConditionalBranch([8, 70])
      ShowChoices([["Burn \\i[557] \\c[18]Fuzzy Nips\\c[0]", "Burn \\i[626] \\c[18]\\G\\c[0]"], 2])
      When([0, "Burn \\i[557] \\c[18]Fuzzy Nips\\c[0]"])
        ChangeItems([70, 1, 0, 1])
        ShowTextAttributes(["", 0, 0, 2])
        ShowText(["You toss one \\i[557] \\c[18]Fuzzy Inferno Nip\\c[0] into the fire.\\.\\."])
        PlaySE(["RPG::SE(@name=\"Fire1\", @pitch=100, @volume=80)"])
        FlashScreen(["Color(@red=255.0, @green=0.0, @blue=0.0, @alpha=155.0)", 30, false])
        ShowTextAttributes(["", 0, 0, 2])
        ShowText(["You see the reddish plant splitting in two,\\. as the fire burns even brighter."])
        ChangeItems([70, 0, 0, 2])
        JumpToLabel(["end"])
        Empty([])
      When([1, "Burn \\i[626] \\c[18]\\G\\c[0]"])
        Empty([])
      ChoicesEnd([])
      Empty([])

    BranchEnd([])
    Wait([15])
    PlayBGS(["RPG::BGS(@name=\"Fire\", @volume=80, @pitch=100)"])
    ShowPicture([1, "P&C-Camp", 0, 0, 0, 0, 100, 100, 1, 0])
    TintPicture([1, "Tone(@red=17.0, @green=-51.0, @blue=-51.0, @gray=255.0)", 1, true])
    FadeinScreen([])
    Wait([15])
    SetMoveRoute([-1, "RPG::MoveRoute(@repeat=false, @skippable=false, @wait=true, @list=[\"RPG::MoveCommand(@code=45, @parameters=[\\\"$game_map.screen.pictures[1].move(0, 0, 0, 100, 100, 55, 0, 1)\\\"])\", \"RPG::MoveCommand(@code=15, @parameters=[25])\", \"RPG::MoveCommand(@code=45, @parameters=[\\\"$game_map.screen.pictures[1].move(0, 0, 0, 100, 100, 105, 0, 1)\\\"])\", \"RPG::MoveCommand(@code=15, @parameters=[25])\", \"RPG::MoveCommand(@code=45, @parameters=[\\\"$game_map.screen.pictures[1].move(0, 0, 0, 100, 100, 155, 0, 1)\\\"])\", \"RPG::MoveCommand(@code=15, @parameters=[25])\", \"RPG::MoveCommand(@code=45, @parameters=[\\\"$game_map.screen.pictures[1].move(0, 0, 0, 100, 100, 205, 0, 1)\\\"])\", \"RPG::MoveCommand(@code=15, @parameters=[25])\", \"RPG::MoveCommand(@code=45, @parameters=[\\\"$game_map.screen.pictures[1].move(0, 0, 0, 100, 100, 255, 0, 1)\\\"])\", \"RPG::MoveCommand(@code=0, @parameters=[])\"])"])
    Unnamed(["RPG::MoveCommand(@code=45, @parameters=[\"$game_map.screen.pictures[1].move(0, 0, 0, 100, 100, 55, 0, 1)\"])"])
    Unnamed(["RPG::MoveCommand(@code=15, @parameters=[25])"])
    Unnamed(["RPG::MoveCommand(@code=45, @parameters=[\"$game_map.screen.pictures[1].move(0, 0, 0, 100, 100, 105, 0, 1)\"])"])
    Unnamed(["RPG::MoveCommand(@code=15, @parameters=[25])"])
    Unnamed(["RPG::MoveCommand(@code=45, @parameters=[\"$game_map.screen.pictures[1].move(0, 0, 0, 100, 100, 155, 0, 1)\"])"])
    Unnamed(["RPG::MoveCommand(@code=15, @parameters=[25])"])
    Unnamed(["RPG::MoveCommand(@code=45, @parameters=[\"$game_map.screen.pictures[1].move(0, 0, 0, 100, 100, 205, 0, 1)\"])"])
    Unnamed(["RPG::MoveCommand(@code=15, @parameters=[25])"])
    Unnamed(["RPG::MoveCommand(@code=45, @parameters=[\"$game_map.screen.pictures[1].move(0, 0, 0, 100, 100, 255, 0, 1)\"])"])
    Wait([60])
    ControlVariables([2825, 2828, 0, 0, 0])
    ControlVariables([587, 587, 0, 0, 0])
    Script(["@totSW = $game_variables[584]"])
    CallCommonEvent([54])
    ShowTextAttributes(["", 0, 1, 2])
    ShowText(["Toss some \\i[626] \\c[18]Swirlies\\c[0] into the fire?"])
    Label(["more?"])
    Script(["$game_map.screen.pictures[2].show(\"Gnon1\", "])
    ScriptMore(["0, 160, 80, 100, 100, 255, 0)"])
    Script(["@totBurn = $game_variables[2825]"])
    ScriptMore(["@totBurn += $game_variables[2826]"])
    ScriptMore(["@totBurn += $game_variables[2827]"])
    ScriptMore(["@totBurn += $game_variables[2828]"])
    Script(["$game_self_switches[[64,62,\"A\"]] = false"])
    ScriptMore(["$game_self_switches[[64,62,\"B\"]] = false"])
    ScriptMore(["$game_self_switches[[64,62,\"C\"]] = false"])
    ConditionalBranch([12, "@totBurn > 0"])
      ConditionalBranch([12, "@totBurn < 5000"])
        Script(["$game_self_switches[[64,62,\"A\"]] = true"])
        Empty([])
      Else([])
        ConditionalBranch([12, "@totBurn < 25000"])
          Script(["$game_self_switches[[64,62,\"B\"]] = true"])
          Script(["$game_self_switches[[64,62,\"A\"]] = true"])
          Empty([])
        Else([])
          Script(["$game_self_switches[[64,62,\"C\"]] = true"])
          Script(["$game_self_switches[[64,62,\"B\"]] = true"])
          Script(["$game_self_switches[[64,62,\"A\"]] = true"])
          Empty([])
        BranchEnd([])
        Empty([])
      BranchEnd([])
      Empty([])

    BranchEnd([])
    Script(["@i = 0"])
    ScriptMore(["while @i < $game_party.members.size"])
    ScriptMore(["@var = 146 + @i"])
    ScriptMore(["if $game_party.members[@i].id == 1 && $game_party.members[@i].level == 30 #maxK"])
    ScriptMore(["$game_variables[@var] = \" Next Lvl : ----- \""])
    ScriptMore(["elsif $game_party.members[@i].id != 1 && $game_party.members[@i].level == 20 #maxOthers"])
    ScriptMore(["$game_variables[@var] = \" Next Lvl : ----- \""])
    ScriptMore(["else"])
    ScriptMore(["$game_variables[@var] = \" Next Lvl : \" +"])
    ScriptMore(["($game_party.members[@i].next_level_exp - $game_party.members[@i].exp).to_s"])
    ScriptMore(["end"])
    ScriptMore(["@i += 1"])
    ScriptMore(["end"])
    Label(["pCh"])
    ConditionalBranch([12, "$game_party.members.size == 1"])
      ShowChoices([["\\c[18]\\P[1]\\c[0] \\v[2825]\\i[626] - \\v[146]\\i[626]"], 5])
      When([0, "\\c[18]\\P[1]\\c[0] \\v[2825]\\i[626] - \\v[146]\\i[626]"])
        JumpToLabel(["1"])
        Empty([])
      WhenCancel([])
        JumpToLabel(["canc"])
        Empty([])
      ChoicesEnd([])
      Empty([])

    BranchEnd([])
    ConditionalBranch([12, "$game_party.members.size == 2"])
      ShowChoices([["\\c[18]\\P[1]\\c[0] \\v[2825]\\i[626] - \\v[146]\\i[626]", "\\c[18]\\P[2]\\c[0] \\v[2826]\\i[626] - \\v[147]\\i[626]"], 5])
      When([0, "\\c[18]\\P[1]\\c[0] \\v[2825]\\i[626] - \\v[146]\\i[626]"])
        JumpToLabel(["1"])
        Empty([])
      When([1, "\\c[18]\\P[2]\\c[0] \\v[2826]\\i[626] - \\v[147]\\i[626]"])
        JumpToLabel(["2"])
        Empty([])
      WhenCancel([])
        JumpToLabel(["canc"])
        Empty([])
      ChoicesEnd([])
      Empty([])

    BranchEnd([])
    ConditionalBranch([12, "$game_party.members.size == 3"])
      ShowChoices([["\\c[18]\\P[1]\\c[0] \\v[2825]\\i[626] - \\v[146]\\i[626]", "\\c[18]\\P[2]\\c[0] \\v[2826]\\i[626] - \\v[147]\\i[626]", "\\c[18]\\P[3]\\c[0] \\v[2827]\\i[626] - \\v[148]\\i[626]"], 5])
      When([0, "\\c[18]\\P[1]\\c[0] \\v[2825]\\i[626] - \\v[146]\\i[626]"])
        JumpToLabel(["1"])
        Empty([])
      When([1, "\\c[18]\\P[2]\\c[0] \\v[2826]\\i[626] - \\v[147]\\i[626]"])
        JumpToLabel(["2"])
        Empty([])
      When([2, "\\c[18]\\P[3]\\c[0] \\v[2827]\\i[626] - \\v[148]\\i[626]"])
        JumpToLabel(["3"])
        Empty([])
      WhenCancel([])
        JumpToLabel(["canc"])
        Empty([])
      ChoicesEnd([])
      Empty([])

    BranchEnd([])
    ShowChoices([["\\c[18]\\P[1]\\c[0] \\v[2825]\\i[626] - \\v[146]\\i[626]", "\\c[18]\\P[2]\\c[0] \\v[2826]\\i[626] - \\v[147]\\i[626]", "\\c[18]\\P[3]\\c[0] \\v[2827]\\i[626] - \\v[148]\\i[626]", "\\c[18]\\P[4]\\c[0] \\v[2828]\\i[626] - \\v[149]\\i[626]"], 5])
    When([0, "\\c[18]\\P[1]\\c[0] \\v[2825]\\i[626] - \\v[146]\\i[626]"])
      Label(["1"])
      Script(["@m = 0"])
      ConditionalBranch([12, "$game_party.members[@m].class_id == 49 "])
        Comment(["EGG"])
        JumpToLabel(["noEgg"])
        Empty([])
      BranchEnd([])
      Script(["@id1 = $game_party.members[@m].id rescue -1"])
      ScriptMore(["@id = @id1"])
      Script(["@v = 2825"])
      Empty([])

    When([1, "\\c[18]\\P[2]\\c[0] \\v[2826]\\i[626] - \\v[147]\\i[626]"])
      Label(["2"])
      Script(["@m = 1"])
      ConditionalBranch([12, "$game_party.members[@m].class_id == 49 "])
        Comment(["EGG"])
        JumpToLabel(["noEgg"])
        Empty([])
      BranchEnd([])
      Script(["@id2 = $game_party.members[@m].id rescue -1"])
      ScriptMore(["@id = @id2"])
      Script(["@v = 2826"])
      Empty([])

    When([2, "\\c[18]\\P[3]\\c[0] \\v[2827]\\i[626] - \\v[148]\\i[626]"])
      Label(["3"])
      Script(["@m = 2"])
      ConditionalBranch([12, "$game_party.members[@m].class_id == 49 "])
        Comment(["EGG"])
        JumpToLabel(["noEgg"])
        Empty([])
      BranchEnd([])
      Script(["@id3 = $game_party.members[@m].id rescue -1"])
      ScriptMore(["@id = @id3"])
      Script(["@v = 2827"])
      Empty([])

    When([3, "\\c[18]\\P[4]\\c[0] \\v[2828]\\i[626] - \\v[149]\\i[626]"])
      Script(["@m = 3"])
      ConditionalBranch([12, "$game_party.members[@m].class_id == 49 "])
        Comment(["EGG"])
        Label(["noEgg"])
        ShowTextAttributes(["", 0, 0, 2])
        ShowText(["You can't Level Up eggs!"])
        JumpToLabel(["pCh"])
        Empty([])
      BranchEnd([])
      Script(["@id4 = $game_party.members[@m].id rescue -1"])
      ScriptMore(["@id = @id4"])
      Script(["@v = 2828"])
      Empty([])

    WhenCancel([])
      Label(["canc"])
      ShowChoices([["Burn the \\i[626] \\G!", "Leave the campfire."], 2])
      When([0, "Burn the \\i[626] \\G!"])
        Script(["@totBurn = $game_variables[2825]"])
        ScriptMore(["@totBurn += $game_variables[2826]"])
        ScriptMore(["@totBurn += $game_variables[2827]"])
        ScriptMore(["@totBurn += $game_variables[2828]"])
        ConditionalBranch([12, "@totSW < @totBurn"])
          JumpToLabel(["NoSwirl"])
          Empty([])
        BranchEnd([])
        Script(["@exp1 = $game_variables[2825]"])
        ScriptMore(["@exp2 = $game_variables[2826]"])
        ScriptMore(["@exp3 = $game_variables[2827]"])
        ScriptMore(["@exp4 = $game_variables[2828]"])
        Script(["@id1 = $game_party.members[0].id rescue -1"])
        ScriptMore(["@id2 = $game_party.members[1].id rescue -1"])
        ScriptMore(["@id3 = $game_party.members[2].id rescue -1"])
        ScriptMore(["@id4 = $game_party.members[3].id rescue -1"])
        ControlVariables([2825, 2828, 0, 0, 0])
        ControlVariables([587, 587, 0, 0, 0])
        Comment(["#####################"])
        ControlVariables([585, 585, 0, 0, 0])
        ControlVariables([585, 585, 2, 4, "@totBurn"])
        ControlSwitches([648, 648, 0])
        Wait([45])
        Comment(["#####################"])
        ConditionalBranch([12, "$game_self_switches[[64,62,\"C\"]] == true"])
          Wait([30])
          Script(["$game_self_switches[[64,62,\"C\"]] = false"])
          Empty([])
        BranchEnd([])
        ConditionalBranch([12, "$game_self_switches[[64,62,\"B\"]] == true"])
          Wait([30])
          Script(["$game_self_switches[[64,62,\"B\"]] = false"])
          Empty([])
        BranchEnd([])
        ConditionalBranch([12, "$game_self_switches[[64,62,\"A\"]] == true"])
          Wait([30])
          Script(["$game_self_switches[[64,62,\"A\"]] = false"])
          Empty([])
        BranchEnd([])
        Wait([30])
        Script(["$game_map.screen.pictures[2].show(\"Gnon1\", "])
        ScriptMore(["0, 160, 80, 100, 100, 255, 0)"])
        Wait([30])
        ErasePicture([2])
        Comment(["#####################"])
        Script(["if @id1 != 0 && @id1 != -1"])
        ScriptMore(["@bexp = $game_actors[@id1].exp"])
        ScriptMore(["@bexp += @exp1"])
        ScriptMore(["$game_actors[@id1].change_exp(@bexp, true)"])
        ScriptMore(["end"])
        ScriptMore(["if @id2 != 0 && @id2 != -1"])
        ScriptMore(["@bexp = $game_actors[@id2].exp"])
        ScriptMore(["@bexp += @exp2"])
        ScriptMore(["$game_actors[@id2].change_exp(@bexp, true)"])
        ScriptMore(["end"])
        Script(["if @id3 != 0 && @id3 != -1"])
        ScriptMore(["@bexp = $game_actors[@id3].exp"])
        ScriptMore(["@bexp += @exp3"])
        ScriptMore(["$game_actors[@id3].change_exp(@bexp, true)"])
        ScriptMore(["end"])
        ScriptMore(["if @id4 != 0 && @id4 != -1"])
        ScriptMore(["@bexp = $game_actors[@id4].exp"])
        ScriptMore(["@bexp += @exp4"])
        ScriptMore(["$game_actors[@id4].change_exp(@bexp, true)"])
        ScriptMore(["end"])
        Script(["@totSW = $game_variables[584]"])
        Comment(["#############"])
        JumpToLabel(["more?"])
        Empty([])
      When([1, "Leave the campfire."])
        Wait([30])
        JumpToLabel(["leaveCamp"])
        Empty([])
      ChoicesEnd([])
      Empty([])

    ChoicesEnd([])
    Comment(["########################"])
    ConditionalBranch([12, "@id == 0 || @id == -1"])
      Empty([])

    Else([])
      Label(["input"])
      InputNumber([587, 5])
      Script(["@burn = $game_variables[587]"])
      Script(["$game_variables[587] = 0"])
      ConditionalBranch([12, "@totSW < @burn"])
        Label(["NoSwirl"])
        PlaySE(["RPG::SE(@name=\"Buzzer1\", @pitch=100, @volume=80)"])
        ShowTextAttributes(["", 0, 1, 2])
        ShowText(["You don't have enough \\i[626] \\G!"])
        Empty([])
      Else([])
        Script(["$game_variables[@v] = @burn"])
        Empty([])
      BranchEnd([])
      Empty([])

    BranchEnd([])
    JumpToLabel(["more?"])
    Comment(["########################"])
    Label(["afterBurn"])
    Comment(["########################"])
    Wait([120])
    Label(["leaveCamp"])
    ErasePicture([2])
    FadeoutBGS([3])
    SetMoveRoute([-1, "RPG::MoveRoute(@repeat=false, @skippable=false, @wait=true, @list=[\"RPG::MoveCommand(@code=45, @parameters=[\\\"$game_map.screen.pictures[1].move(0, 0, 0, 100, 100, 205, 0, 1)\\\"])\", \"RPG::MoveCommand(@code=15, @parameters=[25])\", \"RPG::MoveCommand(@code=45, @parameters=[\\\"$game_map.screen.pictures[1].move(0, 0, 0, 100, 100, 155, 0, 1)\\\"])\", \"RPG::MoveCommand(@code=15, @parameters=[25])\", \"RPG::MoveCommand(@code=45, @parameters=[\\\"$game_map.screen.pictures[1].move(0, 0, 0, 100, 100, 105, 0, 1)\\\"])\", \"RPG::MoveCommand(@code=15, @parameters=[25])\", \"RPG::MoveCommand(@code=45, @parameters=[\\\"$game_map.screen.pictures[1].move(0, 0, 0, 100, 100, 55, 0, 1)\\\"])\", \"RPG::MoveCommand(@code=15, @parameters=[25])\", \"RPG::MoveCommand(@code=0, @parameters=[])\"])"])
    Unnamed(["RPG::MoveCommand(@code=45, @parameters=[\"$game_map.screen.pictures[1].move(0, 0, 0, 100, 100, 205, 0, 1)\"])"])
    Unnamed(["RPG::MoveCommand(@code=15, @parameters=[25])"])
    Unnamed(["RPG::MoveCommand(@code=45, @parameters=[\"$game_map.screen.pictures[1].move(0, 0, 0, 100, 100, 155, 0, 1)\"])"])
    Unnamed(["RPG::MoveCommand(@code=15, @parameters=[25])"])
    Unnamed(["RPG::MoveCommand(@code=45, @parameters=[\"$game_map.screen.pictures[1].move(0, 0, 0, 100, 100, 105, 0, 1)\"])"])
    Unnamed(["RPG::MoveCommand(@code=15, @parameters=[25])"])
    Unnamed(["RPG::MoveCommand(@code=45, @parameters=[\"$game_map.screen.pictures[1].move(0, 0, 0, 100, 100, 55, 0, 1)\"])"])
    Unnamed(["RPG::MoveCommand(@code=15, @parameters=[25])"])
    ErasePicture([1])
    Wait([15])
    Comment(["#######################"])
    Label(["end"])
    Script(["$game_self_switches[[64,62,\"A\"]] = false"])
    ScriptMore(["$game_self_switches[[64,62,\"B\"]] = false"])
    ScriptMore(["$game_self_switches[[64,62,\"C\"]] = false"])
    Wait([15])
    ErasePicture([2])
    ControlSwitches([3016, 3016, 1])
    Empty([])

    ScriptMore(["elsif $game_party.members[@i].id != 1 && $game_party.members[@i].level == 20 #maxOthers"])

    ScriptMore(["else"])

    ScriptMore(["@i += 1"])
    ScriptMore(["end"])
    Label(["pCh"])
    ConditionalBranch([12, "$game_party.members.size == 1"])
      ShowChoices([["\\c[18]\\P[1]\\c[0] \\v[2825]\\i[626] - \\v[146]\\i[626]"], 5])
